channel.title: [Help] Lunar Book only in deltas?!
channel.description: is there any other Servers + Clients you can download then Deltas with Lunar book, since i've searched in ages all i found was deltas... with lunar book if there is any other plz post link or name (of the serv) here!

item.title: [Help] Lunar Book only in deltas?!
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

erm, my question was: IS THERE ANY OTHER SOURCES THEN DELTAS WHICH HAVE LUNAR BOOK?

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Lunar Book only in deltas?!
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

i guess it’s there, but the problem is finding the interfaceID,

    setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);

thats for normal magic,
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
thats for ancients magic,

the problem is (as i said), that 1151 for normal is and 12855, and for ancient theres no logic in this and finding the lunar magic ID is almost impossible.

You can try but it will be taking some time

OR look at the delta file which ID the lunar is…

Read full topic
